hackathon-description-text: HackMIT is MIT’s largest hackathon. Over a 24-hour period from September 16 to 17, 1,000 hackers from around the world will gather on MIT’s campus to experiment and innovate on software and hardware projects. This is your weekend to dust off old ideas or try something completely new. Imagine the craziest projects possible, and work on the hack of your dreams!
hackathon-eligibility: Teams that were admitted through the HackMIT lottery system and follow the
hackathon-requirements: Make sure you submit the Google Form at go.hackmit.org/submit or your project will not be included in judging.
hackathon-rules:
All rules that are listed on our 
 apply for the entire hackathon. If any rule is violated from this Code of Conduct, the HackMIT organizing team has the right to disqualify your team and project from the competition.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Ticket and flight to a tech conference of your choice (up to $1000 per hacker).
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: General Prize - First Place

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: HackMIT developer pack (choice of hardware/software up to $500 per hacker).
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: General Prize - Runner Up
General Prize - Moonshot

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: DIY RepRap Prusa I3 3D Printer Kit.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Category Prize - Made from Scratch

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Prize: 3DR Solo Quadcopter
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Category Prize - Master of Both Worlds

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Prize: Lockpicking Set + One Choice of: GeForce GTX 1070 OR Saleae Logic Analyzer
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Category Prize - Hack

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: $2000 in Visa Gift Cards for the winning team.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Sponsor Prize - Amadeus - Best Use of Amadeus APIs

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Special Edition BB-8 Droids
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Sponsor Prize - Disney - Best Use of Storytelling

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Opportunity to attend large IBM Conference in 2018 and present their solution to conference attendees. Includes mentoring with IBM Subject Matter Experts and IBM Executives.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Sponsor Prize - IBM - Most Innovative Use of IBM Technology

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Microsoft Surface Laptop for each team member (up to 4).
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Sponsor Prize - Microsoft - Best Microsoft Hack

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Prize: $200 Amex Gift Card for Team
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Sponsor Prize - Datto - Best Use of Encryption

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: All expense paid trip to Facebook HQ for up to 4 team members for hackathon finals.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Sponsor Prize - Facebook - Best Use of Facebook API

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: We will give each of the first prize winners for our hackathon a Roomba 980. The Roomba 980 robot vacuum gives you cleaner floors, throughout your entire home, all at the push of a button. Roomba 980 seamlessly navigates an entire level of your home, keeping track of its location and recharging as needed until the job is done. The AeroForce™ Cleaning System with Carpet Boost automatically increases power on carpets where it's needed most. And with the iRobot HOME App, you can clean and schedule on the go.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Sponsor Prize - iRobot Corporation - Best Roomba 980 Hack

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: GoPro HERO Session
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Sponsor Prize - Concur - Best Travel Hack

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: A one on one meeting with our CTO to discuss anything and everything. What's more, he's an MIT alumni.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Sponsor Prize - GIPHY - Hack Most Likely to Change How We Communicate

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Snapchat Spectacles.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Sponsor Prize - Goldman Sachs - Best Data Visualization

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Remote control paper planes.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Sponsor Prize - Goldman Sachs - Second Best Data Visualization

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Prize: Oculus Rift (or Cash Equivalent)
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Sponsor Prize - Hudson River Trading - Most Interesting Use of Data

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Internship/full-time job interview; Trip to Nasdaq HQ (NYC) or Entrepreneurial Center (SF); Lunch with senior Nasdaq leader. Winning team will have their picture on Nasdaq's Times Square screen and will be shared on Nasdaq's social media platforms.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Sponsor Prize - Nasdaq - Best Re-imagination of Market

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: $1000 in Amazon gift cards for the best security hack (shared among teammates).
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Sponsor Prize - Illumio - Best Security Hack

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Philips Hue Lights for each team member.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Sponsor Prize - Samsara - Best IoT Hack

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The award comes with a year access to Wolfram|Alpha Pro and a year of Wolfram|One, and a $500 gift card for each member of the team. The prize is targeted to students to explore the Wolfram Technology Stack and see what awesome hacks they can create with it.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Sponsor Prize - Wolfram Alpha - Best Use of Wolfram Technologies

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Prize: Snap Spectacles
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Fun Prize - Dystopian Future Hack
